ingredients.item: Finely grated zest and juice 1 lemon
25g pack fresh flat-leaf parsley, leaves only

instructions.step: Coarsely grate the courgettes and place in a colander. Set aside to drain while you make the dressing.
In a large bowl, mix the chillies with the yogurt, allspice, lemon zest and juice, then season to taste.
Add the grated courgette and whole herb leaves to the yogurt dressing, then gently toss together. Serve immediately.
